summary: This document is an internal email from Amanda Kirby to Paul Morris regarding updates on various financial transactions and documents. It mentions the status of several financial items and indicates that some are pending due to missing signatures or recent submissions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is providing updates on financial transactions in her role at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email from Amanda Kirby, receiving updates on financial matters.

persons.name: Jeanne
persons.context: Jeanne is mentioned as the source of a document that was recently received and sent to the ACAT middle office.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA, 10154-0004
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The email discusses the status of several financial documents, including Southern Financial and Southern Trust.
A document referred to as 'Haze' was recently sent to the ACAT middle office and has not yet been reviewed.
Southern Trust is missing a signature and will be sent out on Monday.
The email is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
